articles.title: Intraoperative Ultrasound Imaging Features Guiding Surgical Strategy in Spinal Cord Ependymoma Resection.
articles.summary: Intraoperative ultrasound helps surgeons precisely visualize spinal cord ependymoma boundaries, enabling more complete tumor removal during surgery.

articles.title: Ribosome biogenesis is increased in hepatocellular carcinoma and represents a potential therapeutic target.
articles.summary: Researchers found increased ribosome production in liver cancer cells, suggesting a new potential treatment strategy targeting nucleolar proteins.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
